snippet: The climber Kevin Jorgeson made it across a brutally difficult pitch that had stymied his efforts for six days and held up his climbing partner, Tommy Caldwell, in their effort to complete one of the hardest rock climbs in the world.
abstract: Climber Kevin Jorgeson, after lagging behind his partner Tommy Caldwell, makes it past Pitch 15 on El Captan's Dawn Wall in Yosemite, where he has spent past six days, unable to find holds he needed to continue; Jorgeson and Caldwell are trying to become the first people to free climb the rock wall.
lead_paragraph: The climber Kevin Jorgeson made it across a brutally difficult pitch that had stymied his efforts for six days and held up his climbing partner, Tommy Caldwell, in their effort to complete one of the hardest rock climbs in the world.

headline.seo: Kevin Jorgeson Completes Pitch 15 on El Capitan’s Dawn Wall
headline.main: After Brutal Traverse, Climber Looks Upward
headline.print_headline: After Brutal Traverse, Climber Looks Upward
